metadata.description: SEO skills for Webflow sites — content refresh, optimization, and ranking recovery powered by Webflow MCP.

plugins.name: getting-started
plugins.description: One-time setup that captures business goals, audience, markets, brand voice, SEO and AEO constraints. Saves to your AI config file.

plugins.name: refresh-content
plugins.description: Refresh and optimize Webflow blog articles for SEO — updates dates, meta tags, keywords, internal links, FAQs, and schema markup.

plugins.name: click-recovery
plugins.description: Find pages with high impressions but low CTR — get recommendations and publish optimized meta titles and descriptions directly to Webflow.

plugins.name: monthly-report
plugins.description: Monthly SEO report — what changed, why it matters, and what to do next. Performance overview, content analysis, technical health, and a prioritized action plan.

plugins.name: weekly-report
plugins.description: Weekly SEO pulse — what changed this week, how it tracks against the month, and what to do now. Same depth as monthly, weekly cadence.
